title: Are there any male singers that can sing in a whistle register? - Quora

response.answer_text: There aren’t many male singers who can reach notes that high but there are a few with a considerable amount of fame. Mitch Grassi from the band Pentatonix can reach certain whistle notes. There’s video evidence from 7:14 onwards in this video:  Piet Arion is an Austrian singer/songwriter with a similar range as shown from 7:02 in the video below.  Adam Lopez used to hold the Guinness World Record for highest note sung but was recently surpassed in 2018. His attempt is shown here:  And this last video is just a compilation of male singers who can hit whistle notes in case you just wanted a long list:
